title: Bug 116362[Smoke] NPE throws out when create a cascading parameter
description: Description:NullPointerException throws out when create a cascading parameter.Steps to reproduce:1.Create a sqlserver datasource, the connection urlis "jdbc:jtds:sqlserver://spmdb:1433/test".2.Create a dataset, the sql statement is "select  from dbo.client", set afilter as "clientid <= 15".3.Create a cascading parameter,bind with the dataset. select "ClientID" as thefirst level param, "SalesRepID" as the child level param.4.Error message pops up.Error log:java.lang.NullPointerExceptionat
